dataSetID.title: Dataset ID
dataSetID.description: The ID of the ABS dataset.  You can obtain a list of all datasets by querying http://stat.abs.gov.au/itt/query.jsp?method=GetDatasetList (or equivalent)

regionType.title: Region Type
regionType.description: The ABS region type to query. See the list of all available region types for a dataset.

itemProperties.title: Item Properties
itemProperties.description: Additional properties applied to each item in the group, overriding values retrieved from data sources.
